name: Earthquake Simulator (Betül KARA)
description:
This game was made in 24 hours for "Mini Game Jam #2: Earthquake".  After the end of the Jam period, edits were made to the game.

      Since our country is in an earthquake zone, we made an informative simulation game about how people should behave before, during and after an earthquake. 

      First of all, we should prepare an earthquake bag for earthquake preparedness. In this bag, we should put the items to be used in emergencies under the headings of health, food and communication. We need to put the earthquake bag in a safe and easily accessible place in the house.

      If the person caught in the earthquake is close to the earthquake bag, he/she should take the bag and apply the collapse-trap movement in a safe place.

      When the earthquake is over, they should take the bag and leave the building quickly and carefully and go to safe gathering areas.

      In our play, we wanted to draw attention to the earthquake, transfer this process to the player through a game and inform the player.
